display_long_description:
# Only available in German
GreenGuardiansVR - the game for the “KlimaZeit” ARD broadcast show on the topic “climate-effective lies” on Tagesschau24 on August 9, 2024.
# Tricky and funny multiplayer action in VR
A mega-corporation beams you as robots into a supposedly rosy future despite unchecked climate change. But rebels hack into the system to warn you: Only together can you break through the propaganda machine, escape the company and save the world!
# Short and sweet - 25 to 30 minutes
Experience the high-tech freight train of the mega-corporation E.V.I.L., overcome security, fight fossil drones and face the boss battle with the Juggernaut.
[media]
# Features
- Cooperative VR multiplayer action adventure
- Save the future with action, teamwork and humor!
- Climate crisis meets science fiction meets satire 
- Travel into the future with your friends, resist the mega-corporation's propaganda and hack into the network with the help of the rebels
- Grab a renewable energy pack and literally fight the causes of climate change
- Fun action with brains! Catch the drones with your solar beam like a lasso!
- Intelligent enemies - not only do they bombard you with oil, but they can also ram you and blow you away! 
- With the well-known influencers LeFloid & Itzjanina
- Fun-O-Calypse: Serious topic - fun look
- 1 - 4 players
- Playing time: 25 - 35 minutes

[media]
